title: Why did the iPhone 12 and 12 Pro get 20% shorter battery life when on 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the current readings seen on iPhones. This will be better after few more software updates. Also, other android phones also have shorter battery life when on 5G, that's the reason they give huge battery capacity like 4500 Mah or 5000 Mah.
